posts.title: 「COCI 2009」极地旅行社
posts.text: LCT模板题，本来拿来练手的结果调了好久 代码：#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 30005#define F(x) tree[x].fa#define S(fa, son) tree[fa].ch[son]#define P(fa, son) (tree[fa].ch[1] == son)#define ls(x) tree[x].ch[0]#define rs(x) tree[x].ch[1]int n, q;class Node {public: int val, fa, ch[2], rev, sum;} tree[N];inline void pushup(int x) { tree[x].sum = tree[ls(x)].sum + tree[rs(x)].sum + tree[x].val; }inline bool noroot(int x) { return tree[F(x)].ch[0] == x || tree[F(x)].ch[1] == x; }inline void reverse(int x) { std::swap(ls(x), rs(x)); tree[x].rev ^= 1;}inline void pushdown(int x) { if (tree[x].rev) { if (ls(x)) reverse(ls(x)); if (rs(x)) reverse(rs(x)); tree[x].rev = 0; }}void rotate(int x) { int y = F(x), z = F(y), p = P(y, x), q = P(z, y), a = S(x, p ^ 1); if (noroot(y)) S(z, q) = x; S(x, p ^ 1) = y, S(y, p) = a; if (a) F(a) = y; F(y) = x, F(x) = z; pushup(y), pushup(x);}void pushall(int x) { if (noroot(x)) pushall(F(x)); pushdown(x);}void Splay(int x) { pushall(x); while (noroot(x)) { int y = F(x), z = F(y); if (noroot(y)) rotate(P(z, y) ^ P(y, x) ? x : y); rotate(x); } pushup(x);}inline void access(int x) { int last = 0; while (x) { Splay(x); S(x, 1) = last; pushup(x); last = x; x = F(x); }}inline void makeroot(int x) { access(x), Splay(x), reverse(x);}inline int findroot(int x) { access(x), Splay(x); while (ls(x)) { pushdown(x); x = ls(x); } Splay(x); return x;}inline bool link(int x, int y) { makeroot(x); if (findroot(y) == x) return false; F(x) = y; return true;}inline void split(int x, int y) { makeroot(x), access(y); Splay(y);}int main() { read(n); rep (i, 1, n) read(tree[i].val); int x, y; char opt[10]; read(q); while (q--) { scanf ("%s", opt); switch(opt[0]) { case 'b' : read(x), read(y); if (link(x, y)) puts("yes"); else puts("no"); break; case 'e' : read(x), read(y); if (findroot(y) != findroot(x)) { puts("impossible"); break; } split(x, y); printf("%d\n", tree[y].sum); break; case 'p' : read(x), read(y); Splay(x); tree[x].val = y; pushup(x); break; } } return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < 4312.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「Test」Sort
posts.text: 我太菜了。。这都不会。。 首先可以直接知道他进行了几次完整的操作。 考虑剩下的位置 按权值从大到小考虑。 一个数只会被他前面的大的数交换 那么一个数要么在第一个空位上，要么在原来的位置上。 代码：123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 1000005int n;ll cnt;int a[N], fa[N];int b[N], Pos[N];int find(int x) { return fa[x] == x ? x : fa[x] = find(fa[x]); }int main() { freopen ("sort.in", "r", stdin); freopen ("sort.out", "w", stdout); read(n), read(cnt); rep (i, 1, n) read(a[i]), Pos[a[i]] = i; int pos = n; rep (i, 1, n) { if (cnt < n - i) { pos = i - 1; break; } cnt -= n - i; } rep (i, 1, pos) { b[i] = i; } int tot = pos; per (i, n, pos + 1) { if (Pos[i] <= tot) { while (b[tot]) ++tot; b[tot] = i; } else { b[Pos[i]] = i; } } rep (i, pos + 1, n) { if (!cnt) break; rep (j, i + 1, n) { if (b[i] > b[j]) std::swap(b[i], b[j]); --cnt; if (!cnt) break; } if (!cnt) break; } rep (i, 1, n) printf("%d ", b[i]); puts(""); return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < sort.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「Luogu 5029」 T'ill It's Over
posts.text: 对于每一种长度开一个点，那么每种操作分别建边跑网络流。 因为有区间加边所以要线段树优化建边。 代码：#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 3000005#define M 300005int n, m, k, tot, cnt = 1;int fir[N], nx[N << 1], to[N << 1], w[N << 1], cur[N], dep[N];int tree[M << 2][2];inline void add(int _, int __, int ___) { nx[++cnt] = fir[_]; fir[_] = cnt; to[cnt] = __; w[cnt] = ___;}void build(int l, int r, int x, int type) { if (l == r) { tree[x][type] = l; return; } tree[x][type] = ++tot; int mid = l + r >> 1; build(l, mid, x << 1, type); build(mid + 1, r, x << 1 | 1, type); if (type == 0) { add(tree[x << 1][type], tree[x][type], INT_MAX); add(tree[x][type], tree[x << 1][type], 0); add(tree[x << 1 | 1][type], tree[x][type], INT_MAX); add(tree[x][type], tree[x << 1 | 1][type], 0); } else { add(tree[x][type], tree[x << 1][type], INT_MAX); add(tree[x << 1][type], tree[x][type], 0); add(tree[x][type], tree[x << 1 | 1][type], INT_MAX); add(tree[x << 1 | 1][type], tree[x][type], 0); }}void addTree(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int p, int val, int x, int type) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) { if (type == 0) { add(tree[x][type], p, val); add(p, tree[x][type], 0); } else { add(p, tree[x][type], val); add(tree[x][type], p, 0); } return; } int mid = l + r >> 1; if (la <= mid) addTree(l, mid, la, ra, p, val, x << 1, type); if (ra > mid) addTree(mid + 1, r, la, ra, p, val, x << 1 | 1, type);}void addEdge(int l, int r, int L, int R, int val) { int p = ++tot; addTree(1, k, l, r, p, val, 1, 0); addTree(1, k, L, R, p, val, 1, 1);}std::queue<int> q;inline bool Bfs(int s, int t) { memset(dep, 0, sizeof dep); q.push(s); dep[s] = 1; while (!q.empty()) { int x = q.front(); q.pop(); for (int i = fir[x]; i; i = nx[i]) { int v = to[i]; if (!dep[v] && w[i] > 0) { dep[v] = dep[x] + 1; q.push(v); } } } return (dep[t] > 0);}int Dfs(int x, int t, int Flow) { if (x == t) return Flow; for (int &i = cur[x]; i; i = nx[i]) { int v = to[i]; if (dep[v] == dep[x] + 1 && w[i] > 0) { int nowFlow = Dfs(v, t, min(Flow, w[i])); if (!nowFlow) continue; w[i] -= nowFlow; w[i ^ 1] += nowFlow; return nowFlow; } } return 0;}inline int Dinic(int s, int t) { int sumFlow = 0, d; while (Bfs(s, t)) { memcpy(cur, fir, sizeof fir); while (d = Dfs(s, t, INT_MAX)) { sumFlow += d; } } return sumFlow;}int main() { read(n), read(m), read(k); tot = k; build(1, k, 1, 0); build(1, k, 1, 1); int opt, l, r, L, R, val; rep (i, 1, m) { read(opt), read(val); if (opt == 1) { read(l), read(r); add(l, r, val), add(r, l, 0); } if (opt == 2) { read(l), read(r), read(L); addEdge(l, r, L, L, val); addEdge(L, L, l, r, 0); } if (opt == 3) { read(l), read(L), read(R); addEdge(l, l, L, R, val); addEdge(L, R, l, l, 0); } if (opt == 4) { read(l), read(r), read(L), read(R); addEdge(l, r, L, R, val); addEdge(L, R, l, r, 0); } } add(0, 1, n); add(1, 0, n); printf("%d\n", Dinic(0, k)); return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < 5029.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「CERC」Bricks
posts.text: 首先发现一个性质。 分割的比例为黑白砖块总数的比 那么能分就分。 要判只有一种颜色的情况 代码：123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 100005int T;int n, m;char s[3];ll all[2];class Node {public: int val, type;} a[N];int main() { read(T); while (T--) { read(n); all[0] = all[1] = 0; rep (i, 1, n) { read(a[i].val); scanf ("%s", s); if (s[0] == 'W') a[i].type = 1; else a[i].type = 0; all[a[i].type] += a[i].val; } if (!all[0] || !all[1]) { printf("%lld\n", all[0] + all[1]); continue; } ll tot[2], ans = 0; tot[0] = tot[1] = 0; rep (i, 1, n) { if (!tot[0] && !tot[1]) tot[a[i].type] = a[i].val; else { if (a[i].type == 1) { if (tot[0] * all[1] % all[0]) { tot[1] += a[i].val; continue; } ll need = tot[0] * all[1] / all[0]; if (need == 0) { tot[1] += a[i].val; continue; } if (need <= a[i].val + tot[1] && need - tot[1] >= 0) { ll tmp = tot[1] + a[i].val - need; tot[0] = tot[1] = 0; tot[1] = tmp; ++ans; } else { tot[1] += a[i].val; continue; } } else { if (tot[1] * all[0] % all[1]) { tot[0] += a[i].val; continue; } ll need = tot[1] * all[0] / all[1]; if (need == 0) { tot[0] += a[i].val; continue; } if (need <= a[i].val + tot[0] && need - tot[0] >= 0) { ll tmp = tot[0] + a[i].val - need; tot[0] = tot[1] = 0; tot[0] = tmp; ++ans; } else { tot[0] += a[i].val; continue; } } } } printf("%lld\n", ans); } return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < 4763.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「Test」全连
posts.text: 考试的时候想到了线段树，但时间不够就随手打了打，超时了 晚上去厕所的时候想了一下，发现自己傻逼了。。 在维护左端点的时候用堆维护一下就好了。 我居然傻乎乎的写了考试的时候那种 ZZ 做法。。 代码：123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133134#pragma GCC optimize(3)#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<long long, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 1000005int n;ll t[N], a[N];ll f[N << 1];class SegmentTree {public: PI tree[N << 2]; void pushup(int x) { if (tree[x << 1].first > tree[x << 1 | 1].first) tree[x] = tree[x << 1]; else tree[x] = tree[x << 1 | 1]; } void modify(int l, int r, int pos, ll val, int x) { if (l == r) return tree[x].first = val, tree[x].second = l, void(); reg int mid = l + r >> 1; if (pos <= mid) modify(l, mid, pos, val, x << 1); else modify(mid + 1, r, pos, val, x << 1 | 1); pushup(x); } PI query(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int x) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) return tree[x]; int mid = l + r >> 1; PI res; res.first = -LLONG_MAX; res.second = 0; if (la <= mid) res = query(l, mid, la, ra, x << 1); if (ra > mid) { PI tmp = query(mid + 1, r, la, ra, x << 1 | 1); if (tmp.first >= res.first) res = tmp; } return res; } void build(int l, int r, int x) { if (l == r) return tree[x].first = -LLONG_MAX, tree[x].second = 0, void(); reg int mid = l + r >> 1; build(l, mid, x << 1); build(mid + 1, r, x << 1 | 1); pushup(x); }} seg;int tot; int tf[N];std::priority_queue<PI> q; int main() { freopen ("fc.in", "r", stdin); freopen ("fc.out", "w", stdout); read(n); seg.build(1, n, 1); rep (i, 1, n) read(t[i]); rep (i, 1, n) read(a[i]), a[i] = a[i] * t[i]; per (i, n, 1) { while (!q.empty() && q.top().first >= i) { reg PI tmp = q.top(); q.pop(); seg.modify(1, n, tmp.second, f[tmp.second], 1); } reg int pos = i + t[i]; if (pos > n) f[i] = a[i]; else { reg PI tmp = seg.query(1, n, pos, n, 1); if (tmp.first == -LLONG_MAX) { f[i] = a[i]; q.push(mk(i - t[i], i)); continue; } reg int id = tmp.second; if (id - t[id] < i) { tf[++tot] = id; seg.modify(1, n, id, -LLONG_MAX, 1); } else { f[i] = f[id] + a[i]; } } q.push(mk(i - t[i], i)); } ll ans = 0; rep (i, 1, n) { ans = max(ans, f[i]); } printf("%lld\n", ans); return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ______________________________________ < fc.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > -------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「Luogu 2787」 语文1(chin1)-理理思维
posts.text: 听说这是珂朵莉树的板子，但是我不会 开 $26$ 棵线段树，线段树要支持区间赋值，区间求和。 之后的就暴力更新。 毒瘤题面，在最后说大小写不敏感。。 代码： #include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 50005int n, m;char s[N];class SegmentTree {public: int tree[N << 2], tag[N << 2]; SegmentTree() { memset(tag, -1, sizeof tag); } void pushup(int x) { tree[x] = tree[x << 1] + tree[x << 1 | 1]; } void pushdown(int x, int l, int r) { if (tag[x] != -1) { int mid = l + r >> 1; tree[x << 1] = tag[x] * (mid - l + 1), tree[x << 1 | 1] = tag[x] * (r - mid); tag[x << 1] = tag[x], tag[x << 1 | 1] = tag[x]; tag[x] = -1; } } void modify(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int x, int val) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) { tree[x] = val * (r - l + 1); tag[x] = val; return; } reg int mid = l + r >> 1; pushdown(x, l, r); if (la <= mid) modify(l, mid, la, ra, x << 1, val); if (ra > mid) modify(mid + 1, r, la, ra, x << 1 | 1, val); pushup(x); } int query(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int x) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) return tree[x]; reg int mid = l + r >> 1; int res = 0; pushdown(x, l, r); if (la <= mid) res += query(l, mid, la, ra, x << 1); if (ra > mid) res += query(mid + 1, r, la, ra, x << 1 | 1); return res; } } seg[26];inline void Modify(int l, int r, int id) { rep (i, 0, 25) { seg[i].modify(1, n, l, r, 1, 0); } seg[id].modify(1, n, l, r, 1, 1);}inline void Sort(int l, int r) { int tmp[30]; memset(tmp, 0, sizeof tmp); rep (i, 0, 25) tmp[i] = seg[i].query(1, n, l, r, 1); rep (i, 0, 25) seg[i].modify(1, n, l, r, 1, 0); int pos = l; rep (i, 0, 25) { int nx = pos + tmp[i] - 1; if (nx < pos) continue; seg[i].modify(1, n, pos, nx, 1, 1); pos = nx + 1; }}int main() { read(n), read(m); scanf ("%s", s + 1); rep (i, 1, n) { if (s[i] >= 'a' && s[i] <= 'z') s[i] = s[i] - 'a' + 'A'; seg[s[i] - 'A'].modify(1, n, i, i, 1, 1); } int opt, l, r; char str[4]; while(m--) { read(opt), read(l), read(r); switch(opt) { case 1 : scanf ("%s", str); if (str[0] >= 'a' && str[0] <= 'z') str[0] = str[0] - 'a' + 'A'; printf("%d\n", seg[str[0] - 'A'].query(1, n, l, r, 1)); break; case 2 : scanf ("%s", str); if (str[0] >= 'a' && str[0] <= 'z') str[0] = str[0] - 'a' + 'A'; Modify(l, r, str[0] - 'A'); break; case 3 : Sort(l, r); break; } } return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < 2787.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 「ZJOI2013」 K大数查询
posts.excerpt: 这道题我们可以使用毒瘤树套树写，但是我太菜了，不想写。于是我们可以想各种离线算法，这道题我是使用的整体二分。 整体二分就是把所有询问一起二分 —Kewth 所以我们每次二分一个值，用各种数据结构快速求出每个询问的状态，那么这就是整体二分了。 整体二分只是一个小 Trick，随便 YY 一下就出来了 —CYJian
posts.text: 这道题我们可以使用毒瘤树套树写，但是我太菜了，不想写。于是我们可以想各种离线算法，这道题我是使用的整体二分。 整体二分就是把所有询问一起二分 —Kewth 所以我们每次二分一个值，用各种数据结构快速求出每个询问的状态，那么这就是整体二分了。 整体二分只是一个小 Trick，随便 YY 一下就出来了 —CYJian 整体二分的模板类似于这样 1234567891011121314151617void solve(int l, int r, int L, int R) { // l, r: 二分的区间 L, R： 当前被考虑的询问区间 if (L > R) return; if (l == r) { ... // 统计答案 } int mid = l + r >> 1; for (int i = L; i <= R; ++i) { ... // 执行操作 } ... // 还原操作 solve(l, mid, L, head); solve(mid + 1, r, head + 1, R);} 对于这道题，我们每次二分一个值 $mid$ ，用线段树统计出有多少个值大于当前询问，如果当前大于 $mid$ 的数比这个询问的 $K$ 大，我们就把他放入右边区间，否则将 $K$ 减去 $mid$ 放入左区间。 细节很多。 代码： 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130#include <bits/stdc++.h>// Defination {{{#define PI std::pair<int, int>#define mk std::make_pair#define reg register#define ll long long#define rep(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i <= b; ++i)#define per(i, a, b) for(reg int i = a; i >= b; --i)#define pb push_back#define debug(...) fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__)// }}}template<typename T> T max(T a, T b) { return a > b ? a : b; }template<typename T> T min(T a, T b) { return a < b ? a : b; }template<typename T> void read(T &x) { x = 0; reg char ch = getchar(); reg int f = 1; for (; !isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) if (ch == '-') f = -1; for (; isdigit(ch); ch = getchar()) x = (x << 1) + (x << 3) + (ch ^ 48); x *= f;}#define N 50005int n, m;ll ans[N];class Query {public: int opt, l, r, id; ll x;} q[N], lt[N], rt[N];class SegmentTree {public: ll tree[N << 2], tag[N << 2]; void pushup(int x) { tree[x] = tree[x << 1] + tree[x << 1 | 1]; } void pushdown(int x, int l, int r) { if (tag[x]) { int mid = l + r >> 1; tree[x << 1] += tag[x] * (mid - l + 1); tree[x << 1 | 1] += tag[x] * (r - mid); tag[x << 1] += tag[x], tag[x << 1 | 1] += tag[x]; tag[x] = 0; } } void modify(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int val, int x) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) return tree[x] += val * (r - l + 1), tag[x] += val, void(); reg int mid = l + r >> 1; pushdown(x, l, r); if (la <= mid) modify(l, mid, la, ra, val, x << 1); if (ra > mid) modify(mid + 1, r, la, ra, val, x << 1 | 1); pushup(x); } ll query(int l, int r, int la, int ra, int x) { if (l >= la && r <= ra) return tree[x]; reg int mid = l + r >> 1; pushdown(x, l, r); ll res = 0; if (la <= mid) res += query(l, mid, la, ra, x << 1); if (ra > mid) res += query(mid + 1, r, la, ra, x << 1 | 1); return res; }} seg;void solve(int l, int r, int L, int R) { if (L > R) return; if (l == r) { rep (i, L, R) if (q[i].opt == 2) ans[q[i].id] = l; return; } reg int mid = l + r >> 1, head = 0, tail = 0; rep (i, L, R) { if (q[i].opt == 1) { if (q[i].x > mid) seg.modify(1, n, q[i].l, q[i].r, 1, 1), rt[++tail] = q[i]; else lt[++head] = q[i]; } else { ll cnt = seg.query(1, n, q[i].l, q[i].r, 1); if (cnt >= q[i].x) rt[++tail] = q[i]; else q[i].x -= cnt, lt[++head] = q[i]; } } rep (i, L, R) if (q[i].opt == 1 && q[i].x > mid) seg.modify(1, n, q[i].l, q[i].r, -1, 1); rep (i, 1, head) q[i + L - 1] = lt[i]; rep (i, 1, tail) q[head + L + i - 1] = rt[i]; solve(l, mid, L, head + L - 1); solve(mid + 1, r, head + L, R);}int main() { read(n), read(m); int opt, l, r, x; int tot = 0; rep (i, 1, m) { read(q[i].opt), read(q[i].l), read(q[i].r), read(q[i].x); if (q[i].opt == 2) q[i].id = ++tot; } solve(-n, n, 1, m); rep (i, 1, tot) { printf("%lld\n", ans[i]); } return 0; }/* _____ ____ _____|__ / | _ \ |__ / / / | |_) | / / / /_ | _ < / /_ /____| |_| \_\ /____| ________________________________________ < 3332.cpp is created by zrz who is weak > ---------------------------------------- \ ^__^ \ (^^)\_______ (__)\ )\/\ U ||----w | || ||*/

posts.title: 莫比乌斯反演相关记录
posts.slug: 莫比乌斯反演相关记录
posts.excerpt: 关于一些莫比乌斯反演的东西常用操作 [gcd(i,j) == 1] = \sum_{d | gcd(i, j)} \mu(d)例题yy的gcd \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{i = 1}^n \sum_{j = 1}^m [gcd(i, j) == t] \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor} [gcd(i, j) == 1]
posts.text: 关于一些莫比乌斯反演的东西常用操作 [gcd(i,j) == 1] = \sum_{d | gcd(i, j)} \mu(d)例题yy的gcd \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{i = 1}^n \sum_{j = 1}^m [gcd(i, j) == t] \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor} [gcd(i, j) == 1] \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{d | gcd(i, j)} \mu(d) \sum_{t \in prime} \sum_{d = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \mu(d) \times \lfloor\frac{n}{dt}\rfloor \times \lfloor\frac{m}{dt}\rfloor令 $T = td $ \sum_{T = 1}^{min(n, m)} \lfloor\frac{n}{T}\rfloor \times \lfloor\frac{m}{T}\rfloor \sum_{d | T, d \in prime} \mu (\frac{T}{d}) Crash的数字表格 \sum_{i = 1}^n \sum_{j = 1}^m lcm(i, j) \sum_{i = 1}^n \sum_{j = 1}^m \frac{ij}{gcd(i, j)} \sum_{t = 1}^{min(n, m)} t\ \sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor} [gcd(i, j] == 1]\ ij \sum_{t = 1}^{min(n, m)} t\ \sum_{i = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{j = 1}^{\lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor} \sum_{d | gcd(i, j)} \mu (d) ij记 $sum(n) = \frac{n * (n + 1)}{2}$ \sum_{t = 1}^{min(n, m)} t\ \sum_{d = 1}^{min(\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor, \lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor)} d^2 \mu(d) \times sum(\lfloor\frac{n}{td}\rfloor) \times sum(\lfloor\frac{m}{td}\rfloor)记 $ f(n, m) = \sum_{d = 1}^{min(n, m)} d^2 \mu(d) \times sum(\lfloor\frac{n}{d}\rfloor) \times sum(\lfloor\frac{m}{d}\rfloor) $ \sum_{t = 1}^{min(n, m)} t \times f(\lfloor\frac{n}{t}\rfloor, \lfloor\frac{m}{t}\rfloor)
